description:
Reformation of entrances in Kendal & Redington Houses. Alterations to entrances in Grendon, Pavely, Tomay & Foliot Houses.  Window replacement in all housing buildings; CCTV installation; retiling of all externally tiled walls and other external alterations. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.: Location Plan; Ownership Plan; survey of rainwater pipes and gutters dated Jan 2001; details of window replacement; photographs (4 x 4 A4 sheets). KIN-FS01  001-004, 008A-012A,014,015A KIN-FS01  PL001-003,PL004A,PL005,PL006,PL010A,PL011,PL012,           PL015,PL016,PL017 KIN-FS02  001,002,008A-012A,014,015A KIN-FS02  PL001,PL002,PL003A, PL004-PL008 KIN-FS03  001,002A,007 KIN-FS03  PL01,PL02 KIN-RB01  001,002A,006A KIN-RB01  PL01,PL02A,PL03A,PL04,PL005,PL006, KIN-RBO1 B.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
